text:
Oh... this magazine
has Hinana-chan in it...

Hmm~?
Ah, it's a special feature on school makeup~

Is it okay to wear makeup
to school...?
It might depend on the school, don't you think?
Is it okay for both of your schools?

Um, I wonder if wearing
lipstick is okay...?

Hmm~... I'm not sure,
but Hinana has never been told anything~!

So it's probably fine~?
It's better if Hinana looks cute, right~?

...As long as it doesn't get noticed, is it okay...?
Well, as long as it's not too flashy, it should be fine...

I-I...
Could I borrow this magazine for a bit...?
